articles.title: Apple’s 20-year head of developer relations retires ahead of Epic App Store trial - The Verge
articles.description: Twenty years ago, Apple CEO Steve Jobs poached Ron Okamoto away from Adobe to become vice president of developer relations and later help build the App Store. Now, we’re learning he has retired — mere months before Apple’s App Store is set to go on trial.

Ron Okamoto helped build the App Store, and he may be deposed
